TopicTitle: Aurora X- Last rocket You'll ever need(Unless you're crazy and want to launch 1000 tons to orbit)

Articles.Content: When Jeb complained about Delta V issues when launching bigger payloads into space with the previous Aurora rocket, the Kerbals proposed a rocket that could do everything he wanted to do, single launch all your space stations, bases, Jool 5 crafts, and much more, all in one giant monstrosity. Link here!

Nice, but I have more powerful lifters in my portfolio. And yes they are based on stock parts.

 

But 250t is a nice start for big lifters.
